articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Supreme Court denies request to suspend 'public charge' rule for immigrants during pandemic
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Friday denied a request from New York and other states to block the Trump administration's controversial "public charge" rule during the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Trump abruptly exits virus briefing
articles.description: President Trump unexpectedly leaves the coronavirus task force briefing without answering questions, a day after he asked medical experts to look into the possibility of injecting disinfectant as a treatment for the coronavirus.

articles.title: The 5-month-old daughter of a New York firefighter dies from coronavirus

articles.title: Trump administration plans to go to the Supreme Court in Mueller grand jury document dispute

articles.description: If you've been cooped up inside for a few weeks now, chances are you're getting a little antsy. Luckily, The Beatles are here to help, by airing the animated "The Beatles: Yellow Submarine" while hosting a dress up sing-along watch party.
